CurVelocityMagnitudeSquared

Property Value

float

DragCoefficient

The Value Range is 0-1. 0 means no drag, 1 means full drag. Drag determines how much energy the velocity loses per second. Drag of 0.5f would mean the velocity loses half of its energy per second.

public float DragCoefficient { get; set; }
